text: Imi vanhu! Ivai munotya Tenzi venyu (Allah), avo vakakusikai kubva kune munhu mumwe chete (Adam), uye vakava vanosika kubva kwaari (Adam) mukadzi wake (Hawwa â€“ Evha), uye vakave vanosika varume nevakadzi vazhinji kubva kwavari (Adam na Evha). Uye ivai munotya Allah avo vamunokumbira navo (kodzero dzenyu dzakafanira), uye musava munocheka hukama wemimba (weropa). Zvirokwazvo, Allah ndivo vanokuonai nguva dzese
